content: The Buddha's Right Hand is a required Yaoguai Chief boss fight that you can find during Chapter 4 of Black Myth Wukong. Located in the middle section of The Webbed Hollow, this creepy long hand is more than it seems, and blocks the passage down to the Lower Hollow.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Buddha's_Right_Hand.md', within the main section titled 'Buddha's Right Hand'.
The content is as follows:
The Buddha's Right Hand is a required Yaoguai Chief boss fight that you can find during Chapter 4 of Black Myth Wukong. Located in the middle section of The Webbed Hollow, this creepy long hand is more than it seems, and blocks the passage down to the Lower Hollow.
